name: Jeffrey Tejada
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Hello, 


My name is Jeffrey Tejada. I read through your job posting on Craigslist and I am interested in the open position you currently offer. Im a hard worker and quick thinker. I have my own transportation and have a current MMJ Rec. I know the basics of cannabis but I want to learn more and possibly grow within your company. I have extensive warehouse experience but also prior customer service experience. I'm computer savvy and know how to work independenly and efficiently.
experience:
Warehouse Associate, Adecco Staffing Agency- Gardena, CA   08/20/12 – 05/10/13

  • Loading and unloading of merchandise
  • Picking and packing
  • Push and pulling orders
  • Attend all employee meetings and training workshops
  • Use provided picking sheets to accurately pick and pack merchandise
  • Use scanner guns when needed
  • Assist other employees when needed
  • Receive and stock new merchandise in provided locations


Warehouse Associate, Precision Temps Agency- Torrance, CA      06/14/13 – 01/2/14


  • Light office building demolition
  • Use of heavy industrial equipment
  • Heavy clean up
  • Picking and packing
  • Assist onsite supervisor during special events
  • Assist other warehouse personnel
  • Teach new employees when needed
  • Drive to various to locations to for on call assignments and assisting onsite coordinators by setting up for events



Glass Prep/installation helper, Gonzales Glass- Various Counties      03/07/14 – 02/02/15


  • Drive to various locations for glass installations throughout Los Angeles County, Ventura County, Orange County, Etc.
  • Loading and offloading glass onto truck or van
  • Material prep and clean up
  • Assist in glass installations while training, hold and maneuver glass to fit accurately during installation
  • Meet customers at provided homes or locations to take measurements or receive payments
  • Use of hand tools, power tools, and use of measuring tapes



Warehouse Associate, Tightpac America Inc. – Inglewood, CA      05/15/15 – 12/22/15


  • Picking and packing of sealed merchandise while having to be very detail orientated
  • Build pallets and use shrink wrap for shipping, use of correct shipping labels
  • Analyze picking sheets to determine what needed to be sent out on daily bases
  • Meeting and completing all deadline quota in a timely matter
  • Prepping material, merchandise, labels, and other warehouse essentials for the following weeks
  • Communicating problems with shipping manager as well as giving daily updates of shipments
  • Receiving and signing of merchandise when needed
  • Cleaning both the inside and outside of warehouse no matter the weather conditions as well as the occasional watering of plants.
  • Assist the owner, floor supervisor, and all other employees when needed
  • Assist floor supervisor in loading and unloading in other warehouse locations
  • Assist in inventory control as well as restocking on an hourly bases





Self Employed, J & J Décor and Appliances- Inglewood, CA      01/02/16 – Currently


  • Analyze customer demographic and look for value added products
  • Purchase, receive, and sign for all merchandise
  • Use of heavy quality control and repair
  • Inventory control and daily updates of merchandise sold or damaged
  • Use of online products to determine pricing and listings
  • Loading and unloading
  • Meet and greet new and current clientele at provided locations (customer service orientated)
  • Daily deliveries and pick up of merchandise
  • Assembling furniture or appliances while using hand drills, screw and hand tools
  • Pulling, pushing, lifting and handling merchandise as heavy as +60Lbs
  • Use of Microsoft Office to store and use current information
